markdownRemark.html:
Everyone knows the best way to learn is by doing. One of the hardest problems though, is figuring out what to do.

When it comes to programming, you can't just code. You have to come up with what you want to code. Ideas can be hard to come up with if you're anything like me.

That's why I like websites like codingame. In case you haven't heard of it, it's a programming website like hackkerrank, but based in france and they focus on gamification of the platform.

My favorite feature of codingame is called Clash of Code. It encourages you to quickly solve problems while trying to beat up to eight other people solving it at the same time.

frontmatter.title: Everyone who codes should use codingame
